articles.title: Facebook and Instagram could have 12 million paying subscribers by early 2024, says BofA - CNBC
articles.description: A Bank of America (BoFA) research note estimates that Meta's Verified subscription service could generate $1.7 billion "in high-margin revenue in 2024."
articles.content:
Meta's new Verified subscription service could land nearly 12 million subscribers by 2024, according to a Bank of America (BoFA) research note published Tuesday.

articles.title: CWA Urges European Commission to Approve Microsoft's Activision Blizzard Deal - IGN
